author: Staff Reporter
text:
A teacher of Panchayat Union Primary School at Koonandiyur village, in Mecheri block, who submitted fake educational documents was placed under suspension on Thursday.

The fake certificate racket that was busted in Dharmapuri and Krishnagiri districts led to the arrest of two teachers and a middleman. Following this, the Education Department initiated the process of verifying the certificates of teachers in the district. As many as 21 teams scrutinised documents in the district for three days.

Punniyaseelan (45), a secondary grade teacher, had submitted only photocopies of his Class 10 and 12 mark sheets. \ The police are on the look out for him.
title: Teacher suspended for submitting fake documents
